GSD.description:
scsi: qla2xxx: Suppress a kernel complaint in qla_create_qpair()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.110 by commit f97316dd393bc8df1cc2af6295a97b876eecf252. For more details please see the references link.
